select FROM b_order WHERE deleted_flag = 0 and b_order.ID=#{id}

order by b_order.created_date desc limit #{start},#{size}

( #{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.status}, #{item.amount}, #{item.dateFrom}, #{item.dateEnd}, #{item.orderDate}, #{item.payDate}, #{item.sendDate}, #{item.readingDate}, #{item.backingDate}, #{item.doneDate}, 0, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), #{item.createdBy}, #{item.updatedBy}, 1 )
mapper.update:
update b_order
user_id = #{userId},
status = #{status},
amount = #{amount},
date_from = #{dateFrom},
date_end = #{dateEnd},
order_date = #{orderDate},
pay_date = #{payDate},
send_date = #{sendDate},
reading_date = #{readingDate},
backing_date = #{backingDate},
done_date = #{doneDate},
version = version + 1, updated_date = current_timestamp(), updated_by=#{updatedBy}
where b_order.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update b_order set deleted_flag = 1 where b_order.id = #{id}
